We are going to follow chapter 4 from [here](https://bioconductor.org/books/3.18/OSCA.multisample/multi-sample-comparisons.html).

## Packages

Install the necessary R package from Bioconductor.

```{r}
if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install(c("MouseGastrulationData", "scater"))
```

## Data

```{r}
#--- loading ---#
library(MouseGastrulationData)
sce.chimera <- WTChimeraData(samples=5:10)
counts(sce.chimera) <- as(counts(sce.chimera), "CsparseMatrix")
sce.chimera

#--- feature-annotation ---#
library(scater)
rownames(sce.chimera) <- uniquifyFeatureNames(
    rowData(sce.chimera)$ENSEMBL, rowData(sce.chimera)$SYMBOL)
```
